title: SpeakIt
description: A game in which you can listen to and check the pronunciation of English words.

title: English puzzle
description: A game whose purpose is to collect sentences from randomly placed English words.

title: Savannah
description: Coaching Savannah develops vocabulary. The more words you know, the more experience points you get.

title: Audiocall
description: The game improves the perception of English speech by ear.

title: Sprint
description: Teaches you to quickly translate from English.
